S.FORM: (1)kakilimam: (2)nilacul: 1:sepat malebut tulu lasubu dada' a kalisiw, caay yaca pakacakay, wicaay haw sa walu bataan kayadah ku sizi. 2:midang, mala u kalimulakan nu kauzipan nu tademaw minakawaw, amu silawad min ku tademaw haw sa, miladai tu cabay i luma'ay a tademaw taputah midang, caay min kalecal ku piazih tu sacumaay a piidangan
